Can the SME confirm 'throughput indicator' as approved terminology? The SME notes list 'AI dashboard, predictive alert, performance trend' but not 'throughput indicator' — this term is used as a core dashboard element throughout the course.
What is the target tablet hardware specification? Animation complexity (Lottie, SVG stroke, parallax) needs a performance baseline for build decisions.
Does the organization have existing WCAG accessibility requirements that must be met for this eLearning deployment?
How should the capstone be scored: equal weight per question (S1–S4), or weighted by complexity? Is partial credit available on multi-part items (S3, S4)?
Is there an existing LMS or platform that supports SCORM bookmarking for progress saving, or does this need to be built into the course package?
Are there existing post-training support mechanisms (job aids, manager check-ins, refresher nudges) planned outside this course to reinforce dashboard adoption behavior?
